channel.title: miljko tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from miljko.

item.description: Agree with all points save this one. Fiercely regulated by whom? Impartial regulators impervious to political and social pressures? Might as well throw in a pony. https://t.co/EDuavSmqvS https://t.co/evlmTC89DE

@HomegrownJoan2 @thackerpd I have a sinking feeling that regulators did a California roll through most of those policies and are now dismissing signs of anything wrong happening because hey, they had all those policies in place. Hope I’m wrong.
“This is the question that haunts me: How much genius are we losing to the compulsive need to scroll just a little bit more?” Cal Newport has a point https://t.co/0J4862FGKc
